description:
Ladies and gentlemen, please take a seat in the car. Welcome to the automotive luxury of 1930. Classic Packard looks like something out of a black and white gangster movie, and on the track it will steal the show! Don't be fooled by its not-so-aerodynamic line: in the past, they knew how to build great cars and HOT WHEELS™ - Classic Packard will prove to be an exceptional ally in your race to the podium. 

Running in style is a luxury you can afford! Admire the sophisticated details, the lateral spare wheel, the chrome grill… Get on board and pass all your rivals mercilessly, but please… with elegance.

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS™ Pass Vol. 3
name: HOT WHEELS™ - Classic Packard
